articles.description: Making jaggery a part of your daily diet can help boost your immunity, reduce the risk of respiratory disorders, throat problems and digestive issues.
articles.content: Jaggery or Gur is an ultimate winter superfood. The natural sweetener is not only a healthier alternative of refined sugar but also has numerous potential health benefits. Loaded with iron, vitamin C… [+710 chars]

articles.title: Scientists develop new gene therapy for eye disease - IANS
articles.description: According to the study, published in the journal Frontiers in Neuroscience, degeneration of the optic nerves, Dominant optic atrophy (DOA) typically starts to cause symptoms in patients in their early adult years.Thes
